subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: At some early stage in the women's tournament at Wimbledon, it is a safe bet that only one question is going to matter: ‘‘Is that Portuguese girl going to keep shrieking?’’
snippet: At some early stage in the women's tournament at Wimbledon, it is a safe bet that only one question is going to matter: ‘‘Is that Portuguese girl going to keep shrieking?’’
